display_long_description:
Fight with a sword, crossbow, or magic spells in epic co-op multiplayer battles!

**IRONSTRIKE** is a free co-op roguelite featuring physics-based swordplay, gestural spellcasting, and skillful archery. Fight with up to 4 allies in co-op multiplayer, or venture forth solo as you battle to rescue the gods of a vibrant fantasy world. 

[media]


# IMMERSIVE COMBAT

Feel the true momentum of your weapons thanks to an advanced physics system. This isn't just hack-and-slash combat, but rather a skillful dance of parry and riposte.

[media]

# WEAVE MAGIC

Master the intricate gestures of your magic spells and use them to conjure fire, blast lightning, curse your enemies, and bless your friends.

[media]

# CUSTOMIZE YOUR BUILD

Choose your weapon and skill upgrades: imbue your weapons with powerful enchantments, bolster your armor and mobility, or grant yourself new magical abilities.

[media]

# VIVID FANTASY

Instead of dungeon walls or cramped arenas, explore vast landscapes full of crystalline trees, majestic views, and flowing magic. Travel across the planes, from the golden sunlight of Lucros Vale to the ethereal mist of Centinel Wood. Befriend the gods, restore their power, and help them rejuvenate their world.

[media]

# ENDLESS UPDATE

Challenge yourself in the new Endless mode, featuring new enemies, unlockable bonuses, and no limits!
